title: Polar bear alert
creator_credit: National Geographic Society, James Lipscomb and James Deckard
brief_description: Churchill, Manitoba is a small Canadian town known as the ‘polar bear capital of the world’. In autumn dozens of bears pass through on their annual migration. Meet the great white bears, the scientists who study them and the town that copes with their visits. Narrated by Jason Robards.
